EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Preview - Nokia Threat Intelligence Report 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> THREAT INTELLIGENCE REPORT 2019 Dear Valued customer,
In the past you were intereseted in our annual Threat Intelligence Report, therefor let us share with you our latest assessment that will be public soon.
We hope you will find interesting new elements in it as we are now expanding our dataset towards IoT devices as well. If you are interested to hear more around our finding, you are welcome to join our live webinar that will be hosted by InfoSecurity on the 6th of December, 2018. You can Register Now <[[https://www.infosecurity-magazine.com/webinars/malware-telecom-operators/?utm_source=InfosecWebinar&utm_medium=marketing&utm_campaign=NokiaSocial]]>
Best regards, Nokia Threat Intelligence Center team Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
